description: two pillars with a swag between made up of fruits and foliage; center between pillars bust of Apollo with spikes around head (rays?); below swag a lyre and two rods with snakes twined around top half
inscription:
Signature, Date, and Inscription

below image in black: J.C. Sartorius sculp Norimb 1678 | in image in black: Nege Semper arcum & emdit / APOLLO / Non finale nunc, et olimpic crit.  | in image in pencil 2-716
title: Print
